title: President of the Republic receives Vice-presidents of Libyan Presidential Council
text: President of the Republic, Mr Abdelmadjid Tebboune, received Wednesday Vice-Presidents of the Libyan Presidential Council, Mr Moussa Al-Koni and Mr Abdullah Al-Lafi, who are on a visit to Algeria leading a large delegation.
The audience was an opportunity to broach the latest developments of the Libyan issue, notably the running of the transition period in accordance with the adopted roadmap.

On this occasion, the President of the Republic affirmed Algeria’s full support to the Libyan brothers for the reconstruction of the Libyan State likely to preserve its sovereignty and unity, reiterating Algeria’s willingness to host the meetings of national reconciliation, in response to the requests of the Libyan brothers.
The members of the Libyan delegation thanked President of the Republic for Algeria’s position and its full willingness to offer its support to the brotherly Libyan people.
